review.title: “Excellent company, quality people”
review.pros: Pros – Old-time engineering firm turned software company. Still has the old-school mentality. 5 o'clock the parking lot is empty. No digital sweatshop here. They employ high-quality people and treat you well
review.cons: Cons – Bit off more than they could chew with a contract with New York City and nearly put them out of business. of course New York City is famous for that!
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Good company, flexible hours”
review.pros: Pros – Flexible hours. Low pressure environment. Friendly people.
review.cons: Cons – Benefits could be a bit better.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to bring in fresh talent.
